 Uses ZXing (code.google.com/p/zxing) library for detecting QR codes.

There are a set of tasks, each of which carries a certain number of gold coins. The key to every task is hidden in different location in the campus. There is a QR sticker in each of these places. You must search for them and scan them through the app to complete the task. \nWhen you reach a vicinity of the destination, you will receive a hint giving a more accurate description of the task completion point. It is upto you whether you want to use that hint. If you use the hint, you end up getting 1 gold coin lesser when you answer the question.
